subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Nick Watney closed with a two-under 69 at The Black Course at Bethpage for a 72-hole total of 10-under 274 and a three-stroke victory over Brandt Snedeker at the Barclays.
snippet: Nick Watney closed with a two-under 69 at The Black Course at Bethpage for a 72-hole total of 10-under 274 and a three-stroke victory over Brandt Snedeker at the Barclays.
